business_definition: Transaction record layout for reporting purposes containing transaction details including card information, transaction type, merchant data, and timestamps
Primary key for transaction record consisting of card number and transaction identifier
Credit card number associated with the transaction
Remaining transaction details including type, category, amounts, merchant information, and timestamps
Transaction type code indicating the kind of transaction (e.g., purchase, refund, payment)
Transaction category code classifying the transaction into business categories
Source system or channel where the transaction originated
Transaction amount in dollars and cents
Unique identifier for the merchant where the transaction occurred
Name of the merchant or business establishment
City where the merchant is located
Postal zip code of the merchant location
Original timestamp when the transaction was initiated
Processing timestamp when the transaction was processed by the system
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
